## Vector4.multiplyByFloats() method

Returns a new Vector4 set with the multiplication result of the given floats and the current Vector4 coordinates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
multiplyByFloats(x: number, y: number, z: number, w: number): Vector4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> | x value multiply with |
|  y | <code>number</code> | y value multiply with |
|  z | <code>number</code> | z value multiply with |
|  w | <code>number</code> | w value multiply with |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector4`

resulting new vector
